TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISharePointProjectItemTypeExtension

summary.span: 表示特定类型的 SharePoint 项目项的扩展。

span.span: Represents an extension for a particular type of SharePoint project item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口可定义一个扩展, 该扩展在将特定 SharePoint 项目项类型的实例添加到项目中或在 Visual Studio 中打开时加载。Implement the interface to define an extension that is loaded when an instance of a particular SharePoint project item type is added to a project or opened in Visual Studio. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[扩展 SharePoint 项目项](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-sharepoint-project-items)和[如何:创建 SharePoint 项目项扩展](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-project-item-extension)。For more information, see [Extending SharePoint Project Items](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-sharepoint-project-items) and [How to: Create a SharePoint Project Item Extension](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-project-item-extension). 实现此接口的类必须包括 和要由项目系统发现的。Classes that implement this interface must include the and the to be discovered by the project system.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize(class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemType projectItemType) cil managed

param.name: projectItemType
param.span: 要扩展的项目项类型的实例。

span.span: An instance of the project item type being extended.

summary.span: 初始化项目项类型扩展。

span.span: Initializes the project item type extension.
